library(ggplot2)

Column {data-width=350 .tabset}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Chart A

```{r}

ggplot(data = CarreraLuz22, aes(x = categoria)) + 
  geom_bar(colour="#BA8111", fill="#EEC591") + 
  xlab("Categoría") + ylab("Cantidad")+ 
  ggtitle("Cantidad de participantes por categoría")+ 
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5)) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFF8DC"))

```

### Chart B

```{r}
#Convertimos a porcentaje
porcentaje <- CarreraLuz22 %>% 
                group_by(sex) %>% 
                count() %>% 
                ungroup() %>% 
                mutate(percentage=`n`/sum(`n`) * 100)
#Grafico circular
ggplot(porcentaje, aes(x=1, y=percentage, fill=sex)) +
        geom_bar(stat="identity") +
        geom_text(aes(label = paste0(round(percentage,1),"%")), 
                  position = position_stack(vjust = 0.5)) +
        coord_polar(theta = "y") + 
        theme_void()+
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("#AFEEEE", "#FFC0CB"))+
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFF8DC"))+
  ggtitle("Porcentaje de participantes por sexo")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5))

  
    
```

### Chart C

```{r}
ggplot(data = CarreraLuz22, aes(x = categoria, y = timerun, color = "#FF6347")) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x="categoria", y="timerun")+
  ggtitle("Relación Categoría - Tiempo de carrera")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5))+
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFF8DC"))
```

### Chart D

```{r}
ggplot(data= CarreraLuz22, aes(x=sex, y=timerun, color="#FF6347"))+
  geom_jitter(size=1, alpha=0.7)+
  geom_boxplot(alpha=0.7)+
  ggtitle("Distribución de tiempo de carrera de acuerdo al sexo")+
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust=0.5))+
  xlab("Genero")+
  ylab("Tiempo de carrera")+
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#FFF8DC"))



```
